brand.slogan: GetLifeUndo — Ctrl+Z for your life online
hero.title: Bring back lost text, tabs, clipboard and screenshots
hero.subtitle: GetLifeUndo saves your work in real time. 100% local — no cloud, no tracking, no telemetry.
undo.title: What is Undo?
undo.card1.title: Tabs & pages
undo.card1.body: Bring back closed pages, scroll position and session state.
undo.card2.title: Forms & text
undo.card2.body: Recover inputs and long answers you typed before a reload.
undo.card3.title: Files & email
undo.card3.body: Find lost files and emails faster with timeline snapshots.
footer.description: GetLifeUndo brings back lost text, tabs, clipboard and screenshots. 100% local — data stays on your device.
